name: The big, bad 'n ugly one
description: Guess what; a big, bad and ugly map. The only catch is that it took me under 16 hours to make, which is a record time for me at least. Minimum amount of players to have some fun would be around 5 or 6. 10 would be recommended, but to be honest I wouldn't know if it'd work since I've only tested it with crappy bots.
